name: Valentine Warrior
description:
In this time of crisis the only thing that can keep us in state of  solidarity to fight the virus is Love. We would go to any lengths to keep our loved ones safe. So buckle up and protect the love left by eliminating the haters. 

- Level up to get new weapons to fight the hate and save the love in the world. 

- Over 8 types of weapons to fight the haters .

- Get weapon bonuses and health bonuses at the end of each level.

I would like to thank Brackeys for helping me make such a wonderful game. I still remember Asbjørn Thirslund saying that If you want to make a clone Just make it in your now style, don't hesitate, So I decided to give my own twist to classic Asteroids game and took a lot of stuff from his Sugar Warrior game. My main Intention was to make a clone using BlackThronProd's art style that I always wanted to replicate in some game. This is a game where my dream of making my own style of clone and using BTP's art style came true. I would like to thank Asbjørn Thirslund and Noa Calice again for inspiring me to make such a game.
